text: RT @LAPDHQ Effective immediately, ALL evacuations related to the #SaddleridgeFire have been lifted. We thank members of the community for promptly heeding the evacuation orders and their patience as we worked to contain the fire.

When I reflect on how this country passed Social Security in 1935 and Medicare in 1965, I think about how much poverty and suffering we ended.

Our next step is Medicare for All. When we succeed, future generations will appreciate how we made health care a human right in America.

Money in politics is at the heart of the corruption we see today. To get big money out of politics we will:

✔️Ban corporate donations to DNC and inaugurations
✔️Publicly finance federal elections
✔️Overturn Citizens United
✔️Ban advertising during presidential primary debates
